title: fixation
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415105010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415105010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Fixation**

A fixation is the time between [saccade](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415105010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/saccade)s where the eye remains relatively motionless. It is during a fixation that the eye processes the information being viewed through either a word based or shape based (often referred to as [Bouma](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415105010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bouma) on Typophile) recognition process or part based letter recognition process.

This information is processed in the [fovea](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415105010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/fovea) of the eye.
